description:
Job Description
  
  
    Are you looking for a fun, fast-paced, and rewarding experience? Are you looking for a position in a company that can provide career growth and opportunity? Carleton Dining Services would love to have you on our team!
    We are hiring full-time Food Service Workers to join our team at the Oasis late night eatery on Carleton University campus. Our Food Service Workers assist with food preparation, portioning of food and serving customers.
   
    
      Late night schedule: $ 2.00 per hour premium may apply based on hours of work | Shift times range from 6:30pm- 3:00am
    
   
  
 
 
  
    What We Offer
  
  
   
     Health and Dental benefits after 3 months of employment for full-time employees
     Meal program allows you to eat at a discounted price
     Employee Stock Purchase plan program
     Group RRSP for qualifying individuals
     Employee Referral Program
     Training and development
     Position advancement opportunities
     Employee recognition programs including service awards
     Strong focus on a safe and healthy work environment
     Diverse and inclusive workforce
     Aramark Scholarship Program which gives scholarship opportunities for dependents of full-time employees
   
  
 
 
  
    About the Job
  
  
   
     Provide excellent customer service while preparing food and fulfilling orders
     Compile orders accurately and in a timely fashion
     Receive payment by cash, debit/credit card and campus card
     Stock shelves, refrigerators and/or salad bars
     Assist with opening/closing of the location
     Keep stations clean and replenished at all times
     Clean counters and tables
     Empty garbage
     Ensure adherence to all of Aramark Policies and Procedures
     May perform other job duties as required
   
  
 
 
  
    About You
  
  
   
     Experience in the restaurant/food service industry an asset
     Strong customer service skills
     Enjoy working with others in a team setting
     Ability to follow direction and work with minimal supervision
     Cash handling experience an asset
   
    The selected candidate for this position will need to complete and successfully pass a Criminal Background Check.
  
 
 
  
    About Aramark
  
  
    Our Mission
    Rooted in service and united by our purpose, we strive to do great things for each other, our partners, our communities, and our planet.
   
    At Aramark, we believe that every employee should enjoy equal employment opportunity and be free to participate in all aspects of the company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, gender, pregnancy, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, military status, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by applicable law.
   
    About Aramark
    The people of Aramark proudly serve millions of guests every day through food, facilities, and uniform services in 19 countries around the world. Rooted in service and united by our purpose, we strive to do great things for each other, our partners, our communities, and our planet. We believe a career should develop your talents, fuel your passions, and empower your professional growth. So, no matter what you're pursuing - a new challenge, a sense of belonging, or just a great place to work - our focus is helping you reach your full potential. Learn more about working here at http://www.aramarkcareers.com or connect with us on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter.
